abstract: Federal Communications Commission releases results for auctions of licenses of AWS-3 spectrum airwaves showing that AT&T bid total of $18.2 billion, almost half of record $4.9 billion auction.
lead_paragraph: The company bid a total of $18.2 billion to win licenses of the airwaves, known as AWS-3 spectrum.
snippet: The company bid a total of $18.2 billion to win licenses of the airwaves, known as AWS-3 spectrum.

headline.main: AT&T Spends Heavily in F.C.C. Auction of Airwaves
headline.print_headline: AT&T Spends Heavily in F.C.C. Auction of Airwaves
